EmailTemplate.description: Send to US and Canada sample requests for DuPont Roofliner.
EmailTemplate.name: RoofLiner Sample Request
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ RoofLiner Sample Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ RoofLiner. Your sample is on it's way and you should receive in about 10 business days.
This lightweight, easy-to-use synthetic, premium roofing underlayment provides excellent protection against leaks under all types of roof coverings identified by ICC-ES AC48, Section 3.0. It is trusted protection that can give greater peace of mind. Additionally, DuPont™ RoofLiner offers Class A fire rating, superior tear and UV resistance along with better water hold-out and more resistance to mold growth than traditional roofing felt.
DuPont Weatherization Systems are an integrated family of products that work together to provide superior protection of the building envelope. In addition to DuPont™ RoofLiner, DuPont also offers:
Specialized Wraps
Tyvek® HomeWrap® Tyvek® DranWrap® Tyvek® StuccoWrap™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™
Flashing Products
Tyvek® Tape and Fasteners - 100% butyl backed, self-adhered and easy to use.
For more than 200 years, DuPont has been committed to developing solutions essential to a better, safer, healthier life for people everywhere. We continue to create products designed to help reduce the use of energy, water and materials.
I will contact you again soon to confirm receipt of your sample and offer additional assistance with your roofing project.
Sincerely,
Lead.OwnerFullName
DuPont Building Innovations
